animals: The cat is a very popular domestic animal
Dogs are known as man's best friend
The lion is known as the king of the jungle
Elephants have excellent memory and are very intelligent
Dolphins are very social marine mammals
technology: Python is a very popular programming language
Machine learning is revolutionizing artificial intelligence
Quantum computers promise to process data much faster
The internet of things connects everyday devices
Blockchain is the technology behind cryptocurrencies

Swimming is an excellent exercise for the whole body
Tennis demands agility and mental strategy

Sushi is a specialty of Japanese cuisine

Italian pastas have hundreds of different varieties
Spices are essential for adding flavor to food

Atoms are the basic units of matter
Gravity keeps planets in orbit around the sun

search_documents.title: Introduction to Python
search_documents.text: Python is a high-level, interpreted, general-purpose programming language. It is widely used in data science and artificial intelligence.

search_documents.title: Pet Care Guide
search_documents.text: Cats and dogs need daily care including proper feeding, exercise, and regular visits to the veterinarian.

search_documents.title: History of Soccer
search_documents.text: Modern soccer originated in England in the 19th century. Today it is the most practiced and watched sport worldwide.

search_documents.title: Basic Machine Learning
search_documents.text: Machine learning allows computers to learn from data without being explicitly programmed. It uses statistical algorithms to make predictions.

search_documents.title: Traditional Italian Recipes
search_documents.text: Italian cuisine is famous for pasta, pizza, and risotto. Fresh, quality ingredients are essential for authentic dishes.

search_documents.title: Quantum Physics for Beginners
search_documents.text: Quantum physics studies the behavior of subatomic particles. It challenges our intuition about how the universe works.

search_documents.title: Benefits of Swimming
search_documents.text: Swimming is a complete exercise that works all muscle groups. It is excellent for cardiovascular health and joints.

search_documents.title: Artificial Intelligence and Society
search_documents.text: Artificial intelligence is transforming various sectors of society, from medicine to autonomous transportation.

search_documents.title: Animal Behavior
search_documents.text: Studying animal behavior helps us better understand evolution and species adaptations to the environment.

search_documents.title: Physical Training
search_documents.text: A balanced training program should include aerobic exercises, strength training, and flexibility for complete health.
